metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3631 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Docker Engine before 1.6.1 allows local users to set arbitrary Linux Security Modules (LSM) and docker_t policies via an image that allows volumes to override files in /proc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3631` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1').
